lead_paragraph: The country has conducted a series of unsuccessful launches, said to reflect a frantic drive by the country’s leader, Kim Jong-un, ahead of talks with Beijing.

headline.print_headline: North Korea in Rush to Bolster Standing With China, Analysts Say
headline.main: North Korea’s Missile Tests Timed to Bolster Standing With China, Analysts Say

snippet: The country has conducted a series of unsuccessful launches, said to reflect a frantic drive by the country’s leader, Kim Jong-un, ahead of talks with Beijing.
abstract: Experts suggest recent series of failed missile launches by North Korea, with engineers given little time between launches to fix problems, indicates anxiety over leader Kim Jong-Un's credibility ahead of meeting with China, and security dialogue between China and United States.
